post.author: na
post.content:
I'm bit confused with C# and VB.
I am writing a simple C# windows app module.
Application's initail Form1 instanciates a form and populates it using ShowDialog() mehtod.
Is there any way to call a method in Form1 from a new form ?

Greatly appriciate.
post.title: C# call parent form's method.
